attributes.action: Request that all of the MP'S who have misused public money are instantly dismissed and taken to court for repayment of all monies used incorrectly.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There should also be a reform of the act. If they need to commute to London then get a supplemented rail fare/bus. No second homes at all. Maybe an area in London like a travelodge could be used if they are to stay for longer than a night.They do not need the best hotels in order to create the policies for this country. You are doing a job like everyone else, and earning a lot more money than anyone else so there is no need for the public to fund your comforts. Learn to live like the general public live.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
